## Buckets.list() method

Returns a list of all bucket roots.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
list(ctx?: ContextInterface): Promise<pb.Root.AsObject[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ctx | ContextInterface | Context object containing web-gRPC headers and settings. |
